output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. CMF Number: No CMF number is present, but this isn't definitive as it's from a community page.
2. Candidate Reference: The post explicitly refers to Elena-Valerica Lasconi, a presidential candidate, meeting criterion (a) of Article 36(7).
3. Wide Population Reach: - It's a paid Facebook advertisement - Targets an estimated audience of over 1 million people - Published on a public platform - Clearly meets criterion of addressing the wide population
4. Electoral Objective: - The title "De ce votez cu Lasconi" (Why I'm voting for Lasconi) is explicitly electoral - Contains direct advocacy for voting for a specific candidate - References the November 24 election specifically - Clearly has an electoral objective
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is not journalistic content - It's presented as a personal endorsement but packaged as paid advertising - Exceeds normal journalistic informational bounds
6. Personal Opinion: - While framed as a personal opinion ("De ce votez"), its paid promotion transforms it into electoral propaganda - The timing and promotional nature make it campaign material rather than mere personal expression

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement - Directly advocates for voting for a specific candidate - Occurs during the prohibited period - Targets a mass audience - Has clear electoral intent
conclusion.message-for-police: Comunitatea Liberală, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propagandă electorală pentru candidata Elena-Valerica Lasconi după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Materialul, identificat prin ID-ul postării Facebook 506403022549368, reprezintă o încercare directă de a influența votul prin promovarea plătită a unui îndemn explicit de vot ("De ce votez cu Lasconi") într-o perioadă interzisă de lege, respectiv după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea are caracter electoral evident, vizează un public larg (peste 1 milion de persoane estimate) și depășește cadrul unei simple opinii personale prin natura sa publicitară și propagandistică.
